name: Manor Wrecker
description:
Too rich for your own good, a malicious trickster has decided to teach you a lesson about material goods in your own home. Following his whims,  explore and destroy your twisted manor.

A destructive walking sim. Progress through the puzzles of each room in order to escape. Headphones recommended.

Controls

Move: WASD
Look: Mouse
Interact: E

Created by

Josh P., Grace D., Christopher V., Sydney P., Paul L., Vivian F., Pandy M., Natalie L.

Stay up to date on our Devblog!
